title: CULTURAL & CREATIVE ART (DM)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any other three Arts subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Arts or Social Science.

title: HISTORY (DM)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, History and any other three (3) subjects.
subjects: History and any other two (2) Arts subjects.

title: PHYSICS (DM)
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other Science subject
subjects: Physics and any other Science subject.

title: PRIMARY EDUCATION STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credits including English Language.
subjects: English Language and any other three (3) subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/ADULT & NON FORMAL EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) subjects.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/AGRICULTURAL SCI (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Agricultural Science and any two (2)  of the following:

1. Chemistry       2. Geography.  3. Physics    

4. Health Science/Biology  5. Mathematics.     6. Physical  Health Education
subjects: Agricultural Science and any two (2) of Chemistry, Geography, Physics, General Science Mathematics and Biology.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/ARABIC
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies/Arabic and two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) other Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/BIOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Biology and any two (2) of Geography, Chemistry and Physics.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) from the following: Government, Geography, Commerce, History, Business Method, Principle of Account and Typewriting, Office Practice, Secretarial Duties, Shorthand.
subjects: Economics and any two (2) of Commerce, Accounts, Business Methods and Mathematics.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/CHEMISTRY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics/Mathematics, General Science/Biology.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/COMPUTER SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/EARLY CHILDHOOD CARE EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3)   subjects.
subjects: English Language and any three (3) subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics and any two (2) Social Science subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/ENGLISH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2)   Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/FINE ART (D/M)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Fine Art and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/FRENCH
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, French and two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: French and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Geography and two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Geography and any two (2)  of Science subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/HAUSA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Hausa and any two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Hausa and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/HOME ECONOMICS (DOUBLE MAJOR)
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Home Economics and any two (2) of the followings: Home Management, Biology, Chemistry, Needle and Dress Making.
subjects: Any three (3) of Biology, Chemistry, General Science, Economics, Mathematics and Commerce.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/IGBO
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Igbo and any two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Igbo and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects from Biology, Agricultural Science, Physics, Chemistry and General Science.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Islamic Studies and any two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Islamic Studies and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) Science subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) of Mathematics, Physics/Chemistry, General Science/Biology.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/MUSIC
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) Arts subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/PHYSICAL & HEALTH EDUCATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and any three (3) of the followings: Biology, Chemistry, General Science, Health Science, Agricultural Science and any other subject.
subjects: One (1) Science subject and any other two (2) subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and any two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any one (1) of History/Government and two (2) Social Science.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and any two (2) Social Science subjects.
subjects: Any one (1) of History/Government and two (2) Social Science subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/THEATRE ARTS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Literature in English and two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts subjects.

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Yoruba and two (2) Arts subjects.
subjects: Yoruba and any two (2) Arts subjects
